title: Beyond
description: This collection, including the famous "Abreaction" and "Like Young", shows Sturgeon at the peak of his mastery of mind and heart expanding story telling. * "Need" (1960) * "Abreaction" (1948) * "Nightmare Island" (1941) * "Largo" (1947) * "The Bones" (1943) * "Like Young" (1960)Cover Artist: Tom Hallman
author: Theodore Sturgeon
